#BlackMagicCraft #Episode169 #sponsored

This video was sponsored by Crippled God Foundry
To check out their new miniature line head to:
https://www.crippledgodfoundry.com/guild-quests

In this video I build a custom miniature house for a band of angry dwarfs inspired by Crippled God Foundry's new line of resin miniatures.

These are high quality resin miniatures for adult hobbyists.

title: Building a DWARF HOUSE for Crippled God Foundry's new Miniatures
